Package it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller.action.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionSelection
    Action used when a player needs to choose what to do next during his turn.
    AfterUsageExecutable
    Action used after the usage of an ExecutableObject for unloading weapons and removing used powerUps.
    CheckReloadWeapons
    Action used to ask player to reload weapons he can reload.
    CheckRespawn
    Checks if any player needs to respawn, in that case it allows them to do so.
    EndGame
    Action used to print the final ranks and terminate the game.
    ExecutableEffect
    Action used to execute executable objects.
    GameAction
    Generic game action that will be executed during a player's turn.
    GameActionAsync
    Automatic game action that does not require user interaction.
    MoveRollback
    Action used to undo any movement caused by an executableObject.
    ObjectPickup
    Actino used to pick up ammoCards and weapons.
    Payment
    Action used to pay for a buyable object.
    PickPowerUp
    Action used to pick a power up.
    PowerUpSelection
    Action used to choose the power up to use.
    SelectEffect
    Action used to select a weapon effect to use.
    SelectWeapon
    Action used to select a weapon to use.
    SpawnPointTrackSelection
    Action used to select a spawn point track.
    SquareSelection
    Action used to select a square.
    TurnAction.Constants  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TurnAction
    List of standard turn actions.
